abstract: Norinco, a state-owned arms and machinery maker that has been under sanction by Washington, will work with Alibaba in a satellite navigation project.
snippet: Norinco, a state-owned arms and machinery maker that has been under sanction by Washington, will work with Alibaba in a satellite navigation project.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Alibaba, the Chinese e-commerce titan, has always had a capricious streak when it comes to strategic investments and acquisitions.

headline.main: Alibaba Joins Forces With Chinese Arms Maker
headline.print_headline: Alibaba Joins Forces With Chinese Arms Maker on Satellite Navigation Project
